definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
measures of national income and output

pinyin: yu4 qi1 shou1 ru4 piao4 ju4

sentences.english: But developers have little incentive to build less-profitable units for low-income households.
sentences.chinese: 但開發商不願爲低收入家庭建造低利潤的單元房。

sentences.english: Today's companies should think of high-earning singles as a key market.
sentences.chinese: 當今的企業應該把高收入的單身族當成重要的市場。

sentences.english: Bottom line, you bring in revenue for them, you win, they win.
sentences.chinese: 底線就是，你爲他們帶來收入，大家雙贏。

sentences.english: The resources of the private sector will also be harnessed by incentivising training through an outcome - based approach.
sentences.chinese: 私營部門的資源也要通過培訓的收入被激勵和利用。

sentences.english: The new policy on food price will hurt the interest of people on low incomes.
sentences.chinese: 新的食品價格政策將傷害到低收入人羣的利益。

sentences.english: Income luggage was happy to be your shadow installed between heart.
sentences.chinese: 把曾經的快樂收入行囊，將你的身影裝在心間。

sentences.english: They say part of their income comes from the registration fee.
sentences.chinese: 他們稱他們部分收入來源於掛號費。

sentences.english: These factors likely weighed heavily on investment banking and capital markets revenue.
sentences.chinese: 這些因素可能會沉重衝擊投資銀行和資本市場的收入。

sentences.english: Revenue and Margin Driver Suppliers take actions that go much further than improving supply chain efficiencies, reactively or proactively.
sentences.chinese: 收入和邊際利潤驅動廠商對供應鏈的變革更進一步。

sentences.english: Certain other expenses also may be deducted from taxable income, or one may elect to use the "standard deduction.
sentences.chinese: 某些其他支出也可從應繳納的個人收入稅中扣除。

sentences.english: Gambling revenues jumped 59% compared to the previous November.
sentences.chinese: 賭博業收入與去年同期相比激增了59%。

sentences.english: The first thing to deal with for the coming month is your overall income.
sentences.chinese: 你要做的第一件事就是估算你全部的工資收入。

sentences.english: Three, we will spend the excess revenue in the central government budget in an appropriate way.
sentences.chinese: 三是合理安排中央財政超收收入。

sentences.english: Estimate revisions have a larger impact on earnings than do method changes.
sentences.chinese: 預估修正對收入的影響比之改變方法要大得多。

sentences.english: Increment the revenue to date for the district.
sentences.chinese: 增加該地區至今爲止的收入。

definition: expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
